name: Just another zombie
description:
Small game created for TriJam 206: Just another copy

The amateur necromancer summoned his first undead army and learns to control it. For some reason you keep your sanity and not turned into zombie. Try to move like a zombie, not get noticed and take your chance to kill the necromancer and save the kingdom.

Controls: arrow keys.

Tileset and characters:

16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72 https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Fonts:

https://textcraft.net

Music:

Wrath by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Woods Of Imagination by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Metal Interlude by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com

Creative Commons / Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
